title: M9: Using MT to summarise texts into your mother tongue
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 20 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English/French.* ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: Find a similar text in your source language. Supply keywords in your target language.* COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: This task involves summarising a machine-translated text. Get students to note their level of confidence with the MT output as they complete the text. If they have more or less confidence in the MT output, get them to say why. What features of the MT output "raise a red flag"? What features, on the other hand, give them confidence? Do it matter whether or not they understand the source language? (Experiment with source languages they do and do not know.)
